weapon_inspiration_desc0:"A character who has a Weapon Inspiration is [inspired
column3: E]. This can include anything from swords to spears and it will be carried in hand."

column1: armor_inspiration_desc0:"A character who has an Armor Inspiration is [inspired
column2: E] to forge an armor or shield [artifact
column3: E]. This can include anything from mail to lamellar."

column1: book_inspiration_desc0:"A character who has a Book Inspiration is [inspired
column2: E] to write and produce a book [artifact
column3: E]. The topics covered can vary wildly – as can quality – but it will result in a tome fit for royalty."

column1: weaver_inspiration_desc0:"A character who has a Weave Inspiration is [inspired
column3: E]. The imagery and scenes depicted can vary wildly – as can quality – but it will result in a tapestry fit to decorate the walls in your [royal_court

column1: adventure_inspiration_desc0:"A character who has an Adventure Inspiration is [inspired
column2: E] to go on a grand adventure and bring you back an [artifact
column3: E]. The artifacts gained from this Inspiration can vary wildly and can be anything from the skull of a mighty beast to a stolen heirloom."

column1: artisan_inspiration_desc0:"A character who has an Artisan Inspiration is [inspired
column2: E] to apply their expert knowledge of a specific skill to produce an [artifact
column3: E] of great craftsmanship. Woodworkers and tailors are examples of artisans' specializations."

column1: smith_inspiration_desc0:"A character who has a Metalsmith Inspiration is [inspired
column2: E] to forge something more extravagant, and smaller, than a sword or an armor. These are the artists making crowns and goblets, shining and bejeweled."

column1: alchemy_inspiration_desc0:"A character who has an Alchemy Inspiration is [inspired
column2: E] to explore, purify, and create substances and metals, create elixirs, and ultimately perfect the human body and soul."

column1: ttc_inspired_guest_arrival_desc0:"[ttc_inspired_character.GetTitledFirstName] has arrived seeking funding for their [ttc_inspiration.GetName]"

column2: U] skill is legendary and renowned throughout the world."
